welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cirencester, a charming and historic city known for its beautiful architecture and quaint shops. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our vibrant culture and enjoy all that Cirencester has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of RAF Station Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: Located on the east side of the airport, this terminal handles all cargo operations at RAF Station Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gloucestershire Airport houses all necessary facilities for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Brize Norton Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upavon Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oxford (Kidlington) Airport provides services for both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
